>>== MODE ==>>
citation
<<== MODE ==<<


>>== ABBREVIATIONS ==>>
{
    "default": {
        "institution-part": {
            "Waffle":"!here>>>"
        }
    }
}
<<== ABBREVIATIONS ==<<


>>== RESULT ==>>
Wow
<<== RESULT ==<<

>>===== CSL =====>>
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.0"
      default-locale="en-US-x-translit-ja-alalc97-x-translat-en">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <citation>
    <layout>
      <names variable="authority">
        <name/>
        <institution institution-parts="short"/>
      </names>
      <text variable="genre"/>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
<<===== CSL =====<<


>>===== INPUT =====>>
[
    {
        "id": "ITEM-1", 
        "authority": "Waffle",
        "genre":"Wow",
        "type": "book"
    }
]
<<===== INPUT =====<<
